code: import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{LOGIN}from'../redux/actions/loginAction';export default function useLogin(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var handleSubmit=function handleSubmit(email){localStorage.setItem('user',JSON.stringify({email:email}));localStorage.setItem('mealsToken',1);localStorage.setItem('cocktailsToken',1);dispatch({type:LOGIN,payload:email});};return handleSubmit;}
